main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactConsolidation] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:42:15 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblFactConsolidation]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblFactConsolidation]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactConsolidation] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:42:15 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblFactConsolidation]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimConsolidationID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [LTVPassNo] varchar(50) NOT NULL, [DimReportingDateID] [int] NOT NULL, [DimOrganisationID] [int] NOT NULL, [ConsolidationNo] [varchar](50) NULL, [SecurityCount] [int] NULL, [LoanCount] [int] NULL, [ConsolidationDimTrustID] bigint NULL, [ConsolidationValuation] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationBalance] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationLimitBalance] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationOriginalBalance] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationLTV] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationLimitLTV] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationOriginalLTV] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [ConsolidationSeasoning] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [WeightedConsolidationLTV] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [WeightedConsolidationLimitLTV] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [WeightedConsolidationOriginalLTV] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [WeightedSeasoning] [decimal](19, 6) NULL, [DimConsolidationBalanceDistributionID] int NULL, [DimConsolidationLimitBalanceDistributionID] int NULL, [DimConsolidationOriginalBalanceDistributionID] int NULL, [DimConsolidationSeasoningDistributionID] int NULL, [DimConsolidationLTVDistributionID] int NULL, [DimConsolidationLimitLTVDistributionID] int NULL, [ConsolidationScrubbedLoanFlag] varchar(5) null, [ConsolidationPaymentTypeCode] varchar(5) null
CONSTRAINT [PK_tblFactConsolidation] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimPoolID] ASC, [DimConsolidationID] ASC, [LTVPassNo] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
